reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 250/96: RATING BY-LAWS-EXTENSION OF TIME
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 250/96: RATING BY-LAWS-EXTENSION OF TIME
reg_info.act_under: Municipal Act   Loi sur les municipalités

content.content: 1. For 1996, the time for the council of the County of Hastings to pass rating by-laws to raise the general county levy under subsection 374 (2) of the Act and to raise a special county levy for roads under subsection 374 (3) of the Act is extended to June 30, 1996. O. Reg. 250/96, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. For 1996, the time for the council of the County of Hastings to pass rating by-laws to raise the general county levy under subsection 374 (2) of the Act and to raise a special county levy for roads under subsection 374 (3) of the Act is extended to June 30, 1996. O. Reg. 250/96, s. 1.
